conbody.p: (f)(S-90) If the contracting officer determines the woman-owned small business (WOSB) set-aside or the economically disadvantaged women-owned small business (EDWOSB) setaside under the WOSB program shall be withdrawn, the reasons supporting the decision shall be documented on DD Form 2579, Small Business Coordination Record, or in an attached and signed memorandum for record to amend an existing DD Form 2579. The DD Form 2579 shall be retained in the contract file.
